Uses of FullTextEntityManager in org.hibernate.search.jpa
 

Methods in org.hibernate.search.jpa that return FullTextEntityManager
static FullTextEntityManager Search.createFullTextEntityManager(javax.persistence.EntityManager em)
          Deprecated. As of release 3.1.0, replaced by Search.getFullTextEntityManager(javax.persistence.EntityManager)
static FullTextEntityManager Search.getFullTextEntityManager(javax.persistence.EntityManager em)
          Build a full text capable EntityManager The underlying EM implementation has to be Hibernate EntityManager
